text: Wangari Muta Mary Jo Maathai (1 April 1940 â€“ 25 September 2011) was a Kenyan environmentalist, political activist and the first African woman to receive the Nobel Peace Prize in 2004.Gettleman, Jeffrey. "Wangari Maathai, Nobel Peace Prize Laureate, Dies at 71," New York Times. September 26, 2011. == Honors == * Order of the Rising Sun 1st Class, Grand Cordon, 2009Embassy of the Republic of Kenya in Japan: Wangari Maathai , 2009. ==Related pages== *List of Kenyan scientists == References == ==Other websites== * * Maathai Nobel Prize lecture * Audio: Wangari Maathai in conversation on the BBC World Service discussion programme The Forum * Nobel Women's Initiative Category:1940 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Environmentalists Category:Nobel Peace Prize winners Category:Kenyan activists Category:Recipients of the Order of the Rising Sun
title: Wangari Maathai
